column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Getting a hair cut is not always fun but it has to be done regularly if you want to control your hair and not look shaggy and mangy .
#text=First pick a good barber or stylist that you think does a good job and stick with them .
#text=In time they will get to know your hair and needs and will consistantly cut your hair to your liking .
#text=Do n't be afraid to look at pictures of models or whatever to see styles you like and then ask the stylist to try to cut your hair like that .
#text=And always sit still so as they cut your hair they dont slip and mess up a cut .
#text=Then let them show your full cut from front to back with a mirror you hold up and look into the other mirror .
#text=After they take your hair cover thing then give them their money and a few extra dollars for a tip .
